alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 4:12AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN DESOTO... NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL...SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES THROUGH 445 AM CST... At 411 AM CST, the public reported a strong thunderstorm over Collierville, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Collierville, Germantown, Olive Branch, Memphis, Arlington, Somerville, Eads, Warren, Macon, Oakland, Piperton, Rossville, Moscow, Williston, Cayce, Handy Corner, Kirk, Hickory Withe, Fisherville, and Elba. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
